targets.query:
from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mobility-oper:mobility-oper-data/wlan-client-limit")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/cca_util_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-memory-oper:memory-statistics/memory-statistic" or r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/cca_util_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-oper:access-point-oper-data/radio-oper-data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "phy_ht_cfg/cfg_data/curr_freq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-oper:access-point-oper-data/radio-oper-data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "radio_band_info/phy_tx_pwr_lvl_cfg/cfg_data/curr_tx_power_in_dbm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-memory-oper:memory-statistics/memory-statistic" or r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/rx_noise_channel_utilization")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/rx_noise_channel_utilization")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-oper:access-point-oper-data/oper-data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ap_sys_stats/memory_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/rx_util_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/rx_util_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mobility-oper:mobility-oper-data/wlan-client-limit" or r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-oper:access-point-oper-data/oper-data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ap_sys_stats/cpu_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-memory-oper:memory-statistics/memory-statistic" or r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/tx_util_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "9800")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-memory-oper:memory-statistics/memory-statistic" or r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper:rrm-oper-data/rrm-measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["radio_slot_id"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load/tx_util_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "9800")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-client-oper:client-oper-data/traffic-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_tx")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "9800")
